definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
unexpectedly/actually/to go so far as to/indeed
camera lens/camera shot (in a movie etc)/scene
mirror (as a metaphor for sth beautiful, bright and flat -- such as a lake -- or sth that provides clarity and insight)
mirror (as a metaphor for sth beautiful, bright and flat -- such as a lake -- or sth that provides clarity and insight)
photogenic/to appear on film or in the media

sentences.english: Corneal ulcers occur most often in patients who use extended-wear soft contact lenses.
sentences.chinese: 角膜潰瘍最常發生於長期使用軟性角膜接觸鏡的病人。

sentences.english: Endoscopic ultrasonography and computerized tomography demonstrated the lesion to be a cyst in nature.
sentences.chinese: 內視鏡超音波與電腦斷層檢查也證明此病竈爲囊狀物。

sentences.english: Winds flying through the fingers, I sigh deeply at my old image in the mirror.
sentences.chinese: 風從指間掠過，我對鏡中的自己感慨良久。

sentences.english: Vibrating mirror, light writing device, and image forming apparatus.
sentences.chinese: 振動鏡，光寫設備，以及成像裝置。

sentences.english: Most borrowed from my sister or swimming, to finish the task.
sentences.chinese: 最還是向本人妹妹借了游泳鏡，才完成任務。

sentences.english: Examples : She took a last look in the mirror.
sentences.chinese: 她在鏡中望了最後一眼。

sentences.english: He is believed to be the most photographed animal of all time
sentences.chinese: 他被認爲是有史以來最上鏡的動物。

sentences.english: Fifth, the paper studies TRM passive localization with vector hydrophone.
sentences.chinese: 第五，矢量水聽器時間反轉鏡被動定位技術研究。

sentences.english: Phoebe: Look, he gave me his night vision goggles and everything.
sentences.chinese: 他把他的夜視鏡和一切東西都交給我了。

sentences.english: But the safety of precut EPT remains controversial.
sentences.chinese: 但內視鏡乳突先前切開術之安全性有待評估。

sentences.english: To evaluate the feasibility of applying choledochofiberoscope in less-invasive operation for biliary diseases.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討應用纖維膽道鏡施行低創膽道手術的可行性。

sentences.english: Methods The pelvis pressure was reduced through urine drainage from catheter under cystoscope.
sentences.chinese: 方法通過膀胱鏡輸尿管插管引流尿液使腎盂壓力降低。

sentences.english: Structure of heliostat is unusual and different from common ones.
sentences.chinese: 定日鏡結構的形體特殊，不同於普通的建築結構。

sentences.english: Once his work-up came back unrevealing, the urologist suggested a cystoscopy .
sentences.chinese: 檢查完了，泌尿科醫生建議做個膀胱鏡。

sentences.english: It is a pity because recently rumours that female the ghost begging meters of water, avoid gossip mirror hung the boss.
sentences.chinese: 可惜因爲近日盛傳女鬼乞米水，老闆掛着八卦鏡防避。

sentences.english: Measurement of ocular blood flow by scanning laser ophthalmoscope video angiography.
sentences.chinese: 應用激光掃描眼底鏡錄像血管造影測量眼血流指標。
